import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'reactstrap' export class AdminSidebar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { tool: 'All Tools', addmodalIsOpen: false } } addModalOn=()=>{ this.setState({ addmodalIsOpen: true }) } resetData = ()=>{ this.setState({ addmodalIsOpen: false, url: '', title: '', description: '', keyword: '', selectedMeta: '' }) } render() { return ( <>
  • {this.state.tool}
    • SEO Tools
    • SMM Tools
    • Adwords Tools
    • Copywriting
  • Projects
    • Add a Project
    • Project 1
    • Project 2
    • Project 3
  • Upgrade

 ) } } export default AdminSidebar
